Name: Elixir
Ingredients: 45 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
30 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of shaker. Add next 3 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glasses. TOP with soda, stir and serve with straws.
Review: A minty, herbal, refreshing summer drink.
History: Created in 2003 by Gian Franco Pola for Capannina in Cremona and Coconuts in Rimini, Italy.
